text: Do you believe in fate or free will? Why?
What is the meaning of life, in your opinion?
Is happiness a choice or a byproduct of circumstances?
What does it mean to live a 'good' life?
If there's an afterlife, what do you imagine it's like?
Is there such a thing as objective truth, or is everything subjective?
What is the nature of consciousness?
Can artificial intelligence ever truly be sentient?
What is the role of suffering in human existence?
If you could ask the universe one question and get an answer, what would it be?
What is beauty, and where does it come from?
Are humans inherently good or inherently selfish?
What is the greatest human invention or discovery?
Does technology bring us closer together or further apart?
What is the importance of art in society?
If you could know the exact date and time of your death, would you want to know?
What is the nature of time?
What ethical responsibilities do we have towards future generations?
Is ignorance bliss?
What is one philosophical question you often ponder?
